channel.title: Description on Elie Hymowitz

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! Thanks for visiting my website! This is still VERY much a work in progress. It is also where I get to write and post about things that I make and work on. So if you’re interested in learning about me this is the place for that. This part of the website is a little bit about me! I’m originally from Seattle, Washington but I’ve been living in Montreal for the last 7 years (since 2012).
